home.findPokemons: Find all your favorite pokemons and assemble your deck!
home.descriptionPokenons: You can know the type of Pokémon, your strengths, disadvantages and skills and assemble your custom decks!
listDecks.createNewDeck: You haven't created any deck yet.Click the button below to get started.
listDecks.controllerHeader: Are you sure you want to delete the deck?
listDecks.controllerMessage: If you delete, you will lose the saved cards!
cardsAdd.minDeck: Your deck must contain at least 24 cards to save!
cardsAdd.selectPokemons: Select the pokemons you want to add to your deck!
cardsAdd.maxCards: You have already reached the maximum number of 60 cards on this deck!
cardsAdd.sameNameCards: Already have 4 letters of the same name!
cardsAdd.controllerHeader: Are you sure you want to close?
cardsAdd.controllerMessage: If you close, your deck will not be saved!
